Title: Raw Deal
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), VJ Boyd, Elmore Leonard (short story "Fire in the Hole"), Leonard Chang (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: While relegated to walk-up duty, Raylan deals with a runaway computer hacker. Meanwhile, Johnny tries to make a deal with the Mexican cartel ahead of Boyd, and Ava makes new allies in prison.
